author: Sarah Jones
title: The Coronavirus Is Radicalizing Workers
description: The working class was already in crisis before the coronavirus. Now they’re angrier than ever.
content: Corporations are eager to be seen as part of an emerging home front in the war against COVID-19. But over the last 24 hours, workers have called their altruistic bonafides into question. Protests at Amazon, Instacart, and Whole Foods where low-paid workers ha… [+8446 chars]
